snippet: Chemical weapons inspectors have reached 11 of Syria’s 20 sites and have begun destroying equipment at 6 of them, officials said.
abstract: Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons says chemical weapons inspectors have reached 11 of Syria’s 20 sites and have begun destroying equipment at 6 of them.
lead_paragraph: Chemical weapons inspectors have reached 11 of Syria’s 20 sites and have begun destroying equipment at 6 of them, officials said.

headline.main: Disposal of Chemical Arms in Syria Progresses
headline.print_headline: Disposal of Arms in Syria Progresses
